resources.string: Copied output window contents to clipboard
LambdaMC links to the following Haskell packages:

LambdaMC - a demo Haskell Android app to calculate option prices by Monte Carlo simulation. 
 
Web: https://github.com/amulcahy/LambdaMC 
 
LambdaMC depends on and links to the following Haskell packages:
